overview: Forbidden fruits have quite literally been part and parcel of the human story since the beginning of time; but the story of the Garden of Eden has nothing on this collection of spunk-inducing escapades, as some of the hottest, horniest cock-crazed buddies take fruit-and-veg play to a whole new level. Join everyone’s favourite STAXUS beauty, Jaro Stone, together with a basketful of faces both new and familiar – Ron Negba and Jake Stark included – for a feast of temptation that’s full of hard, uncut cocks and ever-hungry twink arseholes!
title: Forbidden Fruits
